item.msgid: %s: invalid xlog-method option "%s", must be "fetch" or "stream"
item.msgstr: %s: ungültige Option „%s“ für --xlog-method, muss „fetch“ oder „stream“ sein

item.msgid: -P, --pset=VAR[=ARG] set printing option VAR to ARG (see \pset command)
could not convert Python object into cstring: Python string representation appears to contain null bytes
item.msgstr: no se pudo convertir el objeto Python a un cstring: la representación de cadena Python parece tener bytes nulos (\0)
La secuencia de escape «%s» no es válida.

item.msgid: \! [COMMAND] execute command in shell or start interactive shell
item.msgstr: \![COMMAND] دستور را در پوسته اجرا می‌کند ویا پوسته محاوره‌ای را راه‌اندازی می‌کند
\cd[DIR] فهرست کاری جاری را تغییر می‌دهد

item.msgid: The connection to the server was lost. Attempting reset:
item.msgstr: ارتباط با سرور قطع شد. سعی در برقراری مجدد ارتباط:

item.msgid: Consider using a full dump instead of a --data-only dump to avoid this problem.
item.msgstr: Considérez l'utilisation d'une sauvegarde complète au lieu d'une sauvegarde des données seulement pour éviter ce problème.

item.msgid: %s: cannot specify both --single-transaction and multiple jobs
item.msgstr: %s : les options --single-transaction et -j ne peuvent pas être indiquées simultanément

item.msgid: could not connect to server: %s Is the server running locally and accepting connections on Unix domain socket "%s"?
item.msgstr: neuspješno uspostavljanje veze sa serverom: %s Je li server pokrenut lokalno i prihvaća veze na 'Unix domain socket'-u "%s"?

item.msgid: could not connect to server: %s Is the server running on host "%s" and accepting TCP/IP connections on port %s?
item.msgstr: neuspjelo uspostavljanje veze sa serverom: %s Je li server pokrenut na 'host'-u "%s" i prihvaća TCP/IP veze na portu %s?

item.msgid: could not create large object for file "%s"
could not get client address from socket: %s
could not get information about host (%s): %s
could not get socket error status: %s
could not restore non-blocking mode on socket: %s
could not set socket to TCP no delay mode: %s
item.msgstr: neuspješno setiranje 'socket'-a u 'TCP no delay' mod: %s

item.msgid: could not set socket to blocking mode: %s
could not set socket to non-blocking mode: %s
could not translate hostname "%s" to address: %s
%s() was not fired by trigger manager
(The owning user of the socket is always the user that starts the server.)
item.msgstr: (Vlasnik 'socket'-a je uvijek korisnik koji je startao server.)

item.msgid: By default, connection logs only show the IP address of the connecting host. If you want them to show the host name you can turn this on, but depending on your host name resolution setup it might impose a non-negligible performance penalty
item.msgstr: Inicijalno log veze prikazuje samo IP adresu 'host'-a. Ako želite prikazati ime 'host'-a, možete uključiti ovu opciju, ali zavisno od vaših 'host name resolution' postavki možete očekivati znatan gubitak performansi.

item.msgid: Do REINDEX in standalone postgres with -P -O options.
item.msgstr: Napravite REINDEX u samostojećem postgres-u sa -O -P opcijama.

item.msgid: Log outgoing port number of the connecting host
REINDEX DATABASE must be done in standalone postgres with -P -O options
item.msgstr: REINDEX DATABASE mora biti napravljen u samostojećem postgres-u sa -O -P opcijama.

item.msgid: Shared libraries to preload into postmaster
item.msgstr: Biblioteke koje će biti učitane prilikom podizanja 'postmaster'-a

item.msgid: bad checksum of backup block %d in record at %X/%X
item.msgstr: pogrešan kontrolni zbroj 'backup block'-a %d za slog %X/%X

item.msgid: bit string length %d does not match type bit(%d)
cannot create bounding box for empty polygon
cannot open multi-query plan as cursor
item.msgstr: neuspješno otvaranje višestrukog 'query plan'-a kao kursor(cursor)

item.msgid: cannot pass result of sub-select or join %s to a function
item.msgstr: nemoguće proslijediti rezultat 'sub-select'-a ili 'join'-a %s u funkciju

item.msgid: cannot use sub-select in EXECUTE parameter
could not bind socket for statistics: %m
could not connect socket for statistics: %m
could not create TCP/IP listen socket
could not create UNIX stream port
could not create listen socket for "%s"
could not create pipe for statistics buffer: %m
could not create pipe for statistics collector: %m
could not create socket for statistics: %m
could not get address of socket for statistics: %m
could not set statistics socket to nonblock mode: %m
item.msgstr: neuspješno setiranje statističkog 'socket'-a u neblokirajući mod: %m

item.msgid: insufficient file descriptors available to start backend
invalid length in external bit string
invalid macro name in dynamic library path
item.msgstr: pogrešno ime makroa u 'dynamic library path'-u

item.msgid: invalid number of points in external polygon
out of file descriptors: %m; release and retry
item.msgstr: nedostatak 'file descriptor'-a: %m; oslobodite pa pokušajte ponovo

item.msgid: query-level statistics are disabled because parser, planner, or executor statistics are on
item.msgstr: statistika upita je isključena jer je statistika 'parser'-a, 'planner'-a, ili 'executor'-a uključena.

item.msgid: the number of buffers (-B) must be at least twice the number of allowed connections (-N) and at least 16
item.msgstr: Broj 'buffers'-a (-B) mora biti najmanje dva puta veći od broja dozvoljenih veza(connections) (-N) a najmanje 16

item.msgid: unnamed constraints cannot be set explicitly
"%s" is a system index. call REINDEX under standalone postgres with -P -O options
item.msgstr: A(z) "%s" rendszerindex. A REINDEX utasítást kell meghívni parancssorból indított, -O -P opciókkal futtatott postgresből

item.msgid: Attribute '%s' has an unknown type Proceeding with relation creation anyway
item.msgstr: A(z) '%s' attributum ismeretlen típusú Automatikus reláció-létrehozás

item.msgid: must be called under standalone postgres with -P -O options
item.msgstr: parancssorból indított, -O -P opciókkal futtatott postgresből hívható csak

item.msgid:
For more information, type "\?" (for internal commands) or "\help" (for SQL commands) from within psql, or consult the psql section in the PostgreSQL documentation.
Report bugs to <pgsql-bugs@postgresql.org>.
item.msgstr:
További informácihozz üss "\?"-t (belso parancsokhoz) vagy "\help"-t (SQL parancsokhoz) a psqlben, vagy olvasd el a psqlrol szoló részt a PostgreSQL dokumentációjában.
Hibákat a <pgsql-bugs@postgresql.org>címen tudsz jelenteni.

item.msgid: No help available for '%-.*s'. Try \h with no arguments to see available help.
item.msgstr: '%-.*s'-h(oeö) nincs segítség. Próbáld a \h-t paraméter nélkül a rendelkezésre álló segítség megtekintéséhez.

item.msgid:
For more information, type "\?" (for internal commands) or "\help" (for SQL commands) from within psql, or consult the psql section in the PostgreSQL documentation.
Report bugs to <pgsql-bugs@postgresql.org>.
item.msgstr:
További informácihozz üss "\?"-t (belso parancsokhoz) vagy "\help"-t (SQL parancsokhoz) a psqlben, vagy olvasd el a psqlrol szoló részt a PostgreSQL dokumentációjában.
Hibákat a <pgsql-bugs@postgresql.org>címen tudsz jelenteni.

item.msgid: No help available for '%-.*s'. Try \h with no arguments to see available help.
item.msgstr: '%-.*s'-h(oeö) nincs segítség. Próbáld a \h-t paraméter nélkül a rendelkezésre álló segítség megtekintéséhez.
新しいスーパーユーザのパスワードを入力してください:
%s: サービス\"%s\"は登録済みです

item.msgid: definition of view "%s" appears to be empty (length zero)
item.msgstr: ビュー\"%s\"の定義が空(長さが0)のようです

item.msgid: query to obtain definition of view "%s" returned more than one definition
item.msgstr: ビュー\"%s\"の定義を取り出すための問い合わせが複数の定義を返しました
もう一度入力してください：

item.msgid: Enter name of role to add:
item.msgstr: 追加したいロール名を入力：

item.msgid: Enter name of role to drop:
item.msgstr: 削除したいロール名を入力：

item.msgid: "\u" must be followed by four hexadecimal digits.
item.msgstr: "\u"の後には16進数の４桁が続かなければなりません

item.msgid: Anyone can COPY to stdout or from stdin. psql's \copy command also works for anyone.
item.msgstr: 標準入出力経由のCOPYは誰でも実行可能です。またpsqlの\\copyも誰でも実行できます
TRAP: %s(\"%s\", ファイル: \"%s\", 行数: %d)

item.msgid: Use the escape string syntax for escapes, e.g., E'\r\n'.
item.msgstr: エスケープ用のエスケープ文字列構文、例えばE'\\r\\n'を使用してください

item.msgid: could not write archive status file "%s": %m
item.msgstr: アーカイブステータスファイル\"%s\"を書き出せませんでした: %m

item.msgid: could not fork new process for connection:
item.msgstr: 接続用の新しいプロセスをforkできませんでした

item.msgid: \df does not take a "w" option with server version %d.%d
item.msgstr: サーバーバージョン%d.%dでは\dfは"w"オプションを受け付けません
\dfはオプションとして[antwS+]のみを取ることができます
もう一度入力してください：
template1 데이터베이스를 postgres 데이터베이스로 복사 중 ...
template1 데이터베이스를 template0 데이터베이스로 복사 중 ...
이미 있는 %s 디렉터리의 액세스 권한을 고치는 중 ...
시스템 개체들 설명 자료 입력 중 ...

item.msgid: %s: no database directory specified and environment variable PGDATA unset
item.msgstr: %s: -D 옵션도 없고, PGDATA 환경변수값도 지정되어 있지 않습니다.

item.msgid: %s: cannot vacuum all databases and a specific one at the same time
item.msgstr: %s: -a 옵션이 있을 경우는 한 데이터베이스를 대상으로 작업을 진행할 수 없습니다.

item.msgid: For more information, type "\?" (for internal commands) or "\help" (for SQL commands) from within psql, or consult the psql section in the PostgreSQL documentation.
item.msgstr: 자세한 내용을 보려면 edb-psql 내에서 "\?"(내부 명령) 또는 "\help"(SQL 명령)를 입력하거나 PostgreSQL 설명서에서 psql 섹션을 참조하십시오.

item.msgid: -P VAR[=ARG] set printing option VAR to ARG (see \pset command)
item.msgstr: -P VAR[=ARG] sette printvalg VAR til ARG (se \pset-kommandoen)

item.msgid: internal error -- neither th nor fh specified in tarReadRaw()
item.msgstr: eroare internă --nu a fost specificat nici th, nici fh în ReadRaw()

item.msgid: server closed the connection unexpectedly This probably means the server terminated abnormally before or while processing the request.
item.msgstr: servern stängde oväntat ner uppkopplingen \tTroligen så terminerade servern pga något fel antingen \tinnan eller under tiden den bearbetade en förfrågan.

item.msgid: could not set socket to close-on-exec mode: %s
item.msgstr: kunde inte ställa in uttag (socket) i "close-on-exec"-läge: %s

item.msgid: %s: options -g/--globals-only and -r/--roles-only cannot be used together
item.msgstr: %s: flaggorna "bara gobala" (-g) och "bara roller" (-r) kan inte användas tillsammans

item.msgid: %s: options -g/--globals-only and -t/--tablespaces-only cannot be used together
item.msgstr: %s: flaggorna "bara globala" (-g) och "bara tabellutrymmen" (-t) kan inte användas tillsammans

item.msgid: %s: options -r/--roles-only and -t/--tablespaces-only cannot be used together
item.msgstr: %s: flaggorna "bara roller" (-r) och "bara tabellutrymmen" (-t) kan inte användas tillsammans

item.msgid: options -c/--clean and -a/--data-only cannot be used together
item.msgstr: flaggorna "nollställ" (-c) och "bara data" (-a) kan inte användas tillsammans

item.msgid: options -s/--schema-only and -a/--data-only cannot be used together
item.msgstr: flaggorna "bara schema" (-s) och "bara data" (-a) kan inte användas tillsammans

item.msgid: Anyone can COPY to stdout or from stdin. psql's \copy command also works for anyone.
item.msgstr: Vem som helst can göra COPY till stdout eller från stdin. psql's \copy-kommando fungerar också för alla.

item.msgid: shared table "%s" can only be reindexed in stand-alone mode
item.msgstr: delad tabell "%s" kan bara omindexeras i "stand-alone"-läge
புதிய முதன்மைப் பயனர் கடவுச் சொல்லை பதியவும்:
%s/base/1 ல் வார்ப்பு1 தரவுக் களன் உருவாக்கப் படுகிறது ...
இருக்கக் கூடிய அடைவுகளில் உரிமங்கள் சரிசெய்யப் படுகின்றன %s ...
இயல்பிருப்பாக இருக்க வேண்டிய max_connections தேர்வு செய்யப் படுகின்றது ...
உருவாக்கப் பட்டிருக்கும் பொருட்களுக்கு சலுகைகள் அமைக்கப் படுகின்றன ...

item.msgid: %s is not a member of extension "%s"
For more information, type "\?" (for internal commands) or "\help" (for SQL commands) from within psql, or consult the psql section in the PostgreSQL documentation.
item.msgstr: 更多信息，请在psql中输入"\?"(用于内部指令)或者 "\help"(用于SQL命令)， 或者参考PostgreSQL文档中的psql章节.

item.msgid: \pset: allowed formats are unaligned, aligned, wrapped, html, latex, troff-ms
item.msgstr: \pset：可以使用的格式有unaligned, aligned, wrapped, html, latex, troff-ms
修正現有目錄 %s 的權限...
載入 PL/pgSQL 伺服器端語言 ...
正在載入系統物件的描述...

item.msgid: If -f/--file is not used, then the SQL script will be written to the standard output.
item.msgstr: If -f/--檔案未使用，SQL 指令碼將寫至標準 輸出。

item.msgid: Enter name of role to add:
Enter name of role to drop:
Anyone can COPY to stdout or from stdin. psql's \copy command also works for anyone.
item.msgstr: 任何人都可以 COPY 至 stdout (或從 stdin 複製)。psql 的\複製指令也適用於任何人。

item.msgid: Use '' to write quotes in strings. \' is insecure in client-only encodings.
item.msgstr: 使用 '' 在字串中寫入引號。\' 在僅用戶端編碼中並不安全。

item.msgid: Use the escape string syntax for backslashes, e.g., E'\\'.
item.msgstr: 使用反斜線的逸出字元字串語法，例如 E'\\'。

item.msgid: Use the escape string syntax for escapes, e.g., E'\r\n'.
item.msgstr: 使用逸出字元的逸出字元字串語法，例如 E'\r\n'。

item.msgid: nonstandard use of \' in a string literal
item.msgstr: 字串實量中的 \' 使用非標準

item.msgid: unsafe use of \' in a string literal
item.msgstr: 字串實量中的 \' 使用不安全
